name: The Last Song Beta Two
description:
The Last Song

You play as a now extinct Kauaʻi ʻōʻō, in search of a mate. You hear a reply to your duet ahead of you, but were knocked into a cave while flying towards the sound of her voice. Progress onward to find your mate while jumping and singing your way to victory!

Controls

A & D - Left and Right

J - Sing

Space- Jump

Left Shift - Glide

I - Switch Songs

Song Descriptions:

Yellow(One Note) - Sends out an attack

Red(Two Notes)- Cause certain Flowers to open up and become platforms, be careful though. Some flowers don't stay open forever and some open and close on their own

Blue(Three Notes) - Summons a hawk to be used as a platform to jump on(not supposed to be used until third level).
